name: Charon
body:
### What is Charon?
Charon is a Decision Tree and Random Forest implementation in F#.
To see an example of Charon in action, check out the following sample, illustrating how to analyze the [Titanic dataset using Charon](https://github.com/mathias-brandewinder/Charon/blob/1188e24e312069e4a4e19199342ae9db5e5456d0/Charon/Charon.Examples/Titanic.fsx).

### Roadmap
####Short Term
* Model persistence
* Deedle integration
* C#-friendly API
####Long Term**
* Analysis of Textual features
* Regression model
* Feature importance analysis
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
